GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.56
GSD.description:
ARM: 9210/1: Mark the FDT_FIXED sections as shareable

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit ba27a912f99efe7d803be16c7617439dd15fc6b7, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 7a1be318f5795cb66fa0dc86b3ace427fe68057f. For more details please see the references link.
